issue.title: [C++][CI] Compiler check for routine returns
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14748](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14748). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When compiling with Clang, default behavior is to have the compiler flag `'warn_unused_result' attribute [-Werror,-Wunused-result]` - enable the equivalent for some of the GCC builds as well.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14748?focusedCommentId=17447492) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11747
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11747>
